column2: Rumors are spreading all over the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] that the Dragonborn has just been discovered. The young man, named Hjalti, allegedly hails from Alcaire and has all the makings of a military genius. He is supposedly offering to join our court as a retainer.
Bring him to me immediately!
Make this supposed "Dragonborn" disappear.
Hjalti will flee your court and find another ruler to serve. If there is none left, he might juste decide to seize power somewhere else...

I have faithfully served under the Empire, but I know that I am capable of far more than this. I am Dragonborn. And I am unstoppable. No man will deny me what should be rightfully mine - and that is the Ruby Throne.

It is another peaceful night in [Root.Liege.Capital.GetName], and I retreat in my chamber after a long day of work. As I prepare myself to go to bed, I hear my window open, and before I can turn myself around I hear an assassin rushing towards me, a dagger in his hand. I hear my liege scream in the nearby bedroom, and as I fight the assassin he manages to slit my throat before dying. As blood flows from my throat, I rush to help my liege, and manage to kill them with the help of nearby guards. But it is too late, [Root.Liege.GetFirstName] is already dying...

I wake up in the small hours of the morning to hear screaming, and the sound of clashing weapons. I arm myself and rush out my bedroom door to see a bloodbath just outside. Disguised assailants are slaughtering my guards. Suddenly, I feel a sharp pain in the side of my neck, as a hand covers my mouth to muffle my scream. My throat is slit, and I collapse to the ground. As I start to black out, I see [From.GetFirstName] standing over me with a bloody dagger, before skulking out of view.

As all [Root.Capital.GetName] prepares to sleep, I hear my wardrobe and my window open, and assassins rush towards me, dagger in their hand. As I try to fight them off while calling for help, I hear fighting in Hjalti's room, before his door quickly opening. I see him and a couple guards rushing to my room, trying to help me. But before the assassins fall, they plant a dagger in my heart. Hjalti tried to use the ancient power of the Voice to kill the nightblades, but I can see his slit throat preventing him from using it. As I feel myself falling unconscious, I can only pray for the future of my family and the Empire I tried to build...
I breathe my last.
You shouldn't be playing as event-based Talos. Even though it may net you the Amulet of Kings.
Shame on you!
Dragonborn Discovered!
By [This.Religion.GetRandomGodName], [From.GetBestName] is the Dragonborn!
Beware, beware, the Dragonborn comes!
A Dragonborn [FromFrom.GetRulerTitle]
A Dragonborn on the Ruby Throne!

Word is spreading that there was an assassination in [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. Although he was too late to save his liege, [FromFrom.GetBestName] slaughtered the attackers and has been crowned [FromFrom.GetRulerTitle].
A Dragonborn on the throne? Troubling...
The Battle of Sancre Tor

Sources from the vicinity of Sancre Tor are reporting that a battle recently transpired there, and that one of the commanding generals was none other than the Dragonborn. In addition, there are rumors that this Dragonborn not only secured an astonishing victory, but discovered an artifact of great power in the Tomb of the Reman Emperors.
Interesting...
